text:
Flatbush Avenue, at the intersection of Washington Avenue, showing the Nelson Hotel. It was removed from its original site to a place which was once part of the old Clove Road.
Eugene L. Armbruster, Collection
about 1890

A peanut vender near the junction of Washington and Flatbush Aves. This view is northwest. The building with the mansard roof is on Lincoln Road, Brooklyn.

About 1905.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
title: Occupations - Peddlers - Food - Refreshments - Peanuts - Brooklyn.
